boardgame.description: Oddly enough, several of you have been hired to build the city of OddVille, home to four powerful worker guilds._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Cleverly place your buildings in order to obtain greater power and fame, while thwarting your opponents' plans. Manage your workers to obtain the resources, coins, and building projects you need in order to make your mark on the city. Plan the city streets to get access to resources or coins from nearby buildings, even if not yours._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Impress the right guild, and you will get a visit from a guild member, who will gladly help you out while enjoying your hospitality. The guild comes first, though: At a moment's notice, every guild member will return to the guild hall, regardless of how much that inconveniences you. Of course, the person who _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;inspired_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; the guild meeting may be chuckling gleefully at the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;unfortunate_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; timing of your guest's departure._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;OddVille is a card-based city-building game in which all actions are carried out by playing one of your four Worker cards. Each Worker card has a different power and can be used in different ways: to get a project, to obtain resources, or to collect coins. During your turn, you can either play a card or add a building to the city. Connect it to adjacent buildings with roads and you will gain their bonus._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The city grows with each player's contribution, ever changing the values of players' buildings. As soon as a player builds his sixth building, the game ends and the player with the most points wins._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: Game in perfect condition English version

Brand new in shrink wrap. Oddly enough, several of you have been hired to build the city of OddVille, home to four powerful worker guilds. Cleverly place your buildings in order to obtain greater power and fame, while thwarting your opponents_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; plans. Manage your workers to obtain the resources, coins, and building projects you need in order to make your mark on the city. Plan the city streets to get access to resources or coins from nearby buildings, even if not yours. Can you be more cunning and build the city faster and better?? Get this game and find out for yourself!! I will ship immediately and will ship worldwide. What_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Your Game? (WYG0002) Oddly enough, several of you have been hired to build the city of OddVille, home to four powerful worker guilds. Cleverly place your buildings in order to obtain greater power and fame, while thwarting your opponents_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; plans. Manage your workers to obtain the resources, coins, and building projects you need in order to make your mark on the city. Plan the city streets to get access to resources or coins from nearby buildings, even if not yours. Impress the right guild, and you will get a visit from a guild member, who will gladly help you out while enjoying your hospitality. The guild comes first, though: At a moment_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s notice, every guild member will return to the guild hall, regardless of how much that inconveniences you. Of course, the person who _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;inspired_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; the guild meeting may be chuckling gleefully at the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;unfortunate_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; timing of your guest_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s departure. OddVille is a card-based city-building game in which all actions are carried out by playing one of your four Worker cards. Each Worker card has a different power and can be used in different ways: to get a project, to obtain resources, or to collect coins. During your turn, you can either play a card or add a building to the city. Connect it to adjacent buildings with roads and you will gain their bonus. The city grows with each player_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s contribution, ever changing the values of players_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; buildings. As soon as a player builds his sixth building, the game ends and the player with the most points wins.

What_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Your Game? (WYG0002) Oddly enough, several of you have been hired to build the city of OddVille, home to four powerful worker guilds. Cleverly place your buildings in order to obtain greater power and fame, while thwarting your opponents_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; plans. Manage your workers to obtain the resources, coins, and building projects you need in order to make your mark on the city. Plan the city streets to get access to resources or coins from nearby buildings, even if not yours. Impress the right guild, and you will get a visit from a guild member, who will gladly help you out while enjoying your hospitality. The guild comes first, though: At a moment_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s notice, every guild member will return to the guild hall, regardless of how much that inconveniences you. Of course, the person who _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;inspired_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; the guild meeting may be chuckling gleefully at the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;unfortunate_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; timing of your guest_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s departure. OddVille is a card-based city-building game in which all actions are carried out by playing one of your four Worker cards. Each Worker card has a different power and can be used in different ways: to get a project, to obtain resources, or to collect coins. During your turn, you can either play a card or add a building to the city. Connect it to adjacent buildings with roads and you will gain their bonus. The city grows with each player_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s contribution, ever changing the values of players_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; buildings. As soon as a player builds his sixth building, the game ends and the player with the most points wins.
